edu.rit.m2mi.nbodies1
Interface Particle

All Known Implementing Classes:
Clock, ParticleImpl, ParticlePanel
public interface Particle

Interface Particle specifies the interface for a charged particle in a two-dimensional N Bodies Simulation.

M2MI Library Version 02-Jul-2002

Method Summary
 void report(int id, double c, double x, double y)
          Report some particle's charge and position.
 void start()
          Start the simulation.
 void step(double dt)
          Take a time step.
 

Method Detail

start

public void start()
Start the simulation. Report this particle's charge and position.

report

public void report(int id,
                   double c,
                   double x,
                   double y)
Report some particle's charge and position. Accumulate that information into the calculation of this particle's velocity for the next time step.

Parameters:
id - Particle ID.
c - Charge.
x - X position.
y - Y position.

step

public void step(double dt)
Take a time step. Move this particle according to its current velocity for the given amount of time, then report this particle's charge and new position.

Parameters:
dt - Size of time step.
